it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.view.component
Class CardHeaderView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.FrameLayout
              it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.view.component.CardHeaderView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, CardViewInterface
public class CardHeaderView
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
implements CardViewInterface

Compound View for Header Component. It is built with base_header_layout xml file.

The base layout has two elements:
  • card_header_inner_frame: frame which contains custom content.
  • card_header_button_frame: frame which contains button.

You can populate and customize this layout using your CardHeader class. See CardHeader for more info.

You can use a custom layout for Header Component in your xml layout.
